docs.snippet: An effective State Department needs a secretary with the president’s ear.

headline.print_headline: Mike Pompeo Is Good for Diplomacy
headline.main: Mike Pompeo Is Good for Diplomacy

docs.snippet: In an extraordinary confrontation, the bipartisan leaders of the Senate Intelligence Committee told the House speaker that his troops had leaked a senator’s texts with a Russia-connected lawyer.

headline.print_headline: Senate Intelligence Panel Says House G.O.P. Leaked a Senator’s Texts
headline.main: Senate Intelligence Leaders Say House G.O.P. Leaked a Senator’s Texts

docs.snippet: Mr. Nunberg, who was one of the first people to take the idea of a Trump campaign seriously, would be in a position to tell the special counsel about the Trump campaign’s origins.

headline.print_headline: Nunberg Says He’s Ready to Cooperate
headline.main: Sam Nunberg Says He’ll Cooperate With Mueller. But What Does He Know?

docs.snippet: The former lawyer, Alex van der Zwaan, had admitted lying to investigators about his communications with a Trump campaign aide and a Ukrainian with ties to Russian intelligence.

headline.print_headline: Former Lawyer Is Sentenced to 30 Days in Mueller’s Russia Investigation
headline.main: Ex-Skadden Lawyer Is Sentenced to 30 Days in Russia Inquiry

docs.snippet: A trial might have to wait, but a formal accusation at least takes care of statutes of limitations.

headline.print_headline: Yes, You Can Indict the President
headline.main: Yes, You Can Indict the President

docs.snippet: Without Congress or a political process, an impeachment investigation will not happen, no matter what he uncovers.

headline.print_headline: Robert Mueller Is Not a Superhero
headline.main: Robert Mueller Is Not a Superhero

docs.snippet: If you didn’t know of Sam Nunberg, that likely changed after his onslaught of media appearances on Monday, when he said the special counsel had subpoenaed him.

headline.main: Sam Nunberg Cut Loose on TV News. But Who Is He?

docs.snippet: His tenure worked out a lot worse for him than for Trump.
President Trump is struggling to find any top lawyers willing to represent him as he faces a critical decision: whether to give the special counsel an interview.

headline.print_headline: Defense Team For President: Army of One
headline.main: At a Crucial Juncture, Trump’s Legal Defense Is Largely a One-Man Operation

docs.snippet: House Republicans, over Democrats’ objections, voted Thursday to release a report concluding there was no collusion between the Trump campaign and Russia.

headline.print_headline: House Report Says G.O.P. Establishment Opened Door to Russian Meddling
headline.main: House Republicans Say G.O.P. Establishment Opened Way for Russian Influence
